Bash("C:\\Users\\Immanuelle\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Python\\Python313\\python.exe" -c "
import requests, json
r = requests.get\(''https://shinto.miraheze.org/w/api.php'', params={
    ''action'': ''query'',
    ''titles'': ''List of Shikinaisha in Musashi Province'',
    ''prop'': ''revisions'',
    ''rvprop'': ''content'',
    ''rvslots'': ''main'',
    ''format'': ''json''
}, headers={''User-Agent'': ''ShintoWikiBot/1.0''}\)
pages = r.json\(\)[''query''][''pages'']
p = next\(iter\(pages.values\(\)\)\)
content = p.get\(''revisions'', [{}]\)[0].get\(''slots'', {}\).get\(''main'', {}\).get\(''*'', ''''\)
print\(content[:2000]\)
")

Bash(C:UsersImmanuelleAppDataLocalProgramsPythonPython313python.exe -c "
import mwclient
import time
time.sleep\(2\)
site = mwclient.Site\(''shinto.miraheze.org'', path=''/w/'', clients_useragent=''ShintoWikiBot/1.0''\)
site.login\(''Immanuelle'', ''[REDACTED_SECRET_2]''\)
cat = site.categories[''Wikidata generated shikinaisha pages'']
pages = list\(cat\)
found = False
for i, p in enumerate\(pages\):
    if p.name == ''Ikaho Shrine'':
        found = True
        print\(f''Ikaho Shrine is at index {i}''\)
        if i+1 < len\(pages\):
            print\(f''Next page: {pages[i+1].name}''\)
        break
if not found:
    print\(''Ikaho Shrine not found''\)
")

Bash("C:\\Users\\Immanuelle\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Python\\Python313\\python.exe" -c "
import mwclient
import io, sys
sys.stdout = io.TextIOWrapper\(sys.stdout.buffer, encoding=''utf-8''\)

site = mwclient.Site\(''shinto.miraheze.org''\)
site.login\(''Immanuelle'', ''[REDACTED_SECRET_2]''\)

# Get first few pages from the category
cat = site.categories[''Wikidata generated shikinaisha pages'']
count = 0
for page in cat:
    if count >= 5:
        break
    text = page.text\(\)
    if ''jalink'' in text.lower\(\):
        print\(f''=== {page.name} ===''\)
        # Print lines with jalink
        for i, line in enumerate\(text.split\(''\\n''\)\):
            if ''jalink'' in line.lower\(\):
                print\(f''  Line {i}: {line[:300]}''\)
        print\(\)
        count += 1
    else:
        print\(f''--- {page.name}: no jalink found''\)
")
